controllers
Class BrainTree

java.lang.Object
  play.mvc.Controller
      controllers.Application
          controllers.BrainTree
All Implemented Interfaces:
play.classloading.enhancers.ControllersEnhancer.ControllerSupport, play.classloading.enhancers.LocalvariablesNamesEnhancer.LocalVariablesSupport
public class BrainTree
extends Application

Validates that user is logged in.
Displays the user's purchases.
Allows searching subscriptions and purchasing one.

GetTrDataCreateCC

public static java.lang.String GetTrDataCreateCC(java.lang.String sCustId,
                                                 java.lang.String sRedirectUrl,
                                                 boolean bVerify)
Builds the TrDate field for Create CC TR transactions (put cc in the vault)

Parameters:
sCustId - The The BrainTree customerId. See @code MakeCustomer
sRedirectUrl - The url BrainTree will redirect us to after we POST the TR
bVerify - True means verify the card before placing it in the vault
Returns:
trData string for the hidden tddata field
